description: This file defines the NoteRepository class, which acts as a data access layer for Note objects, wrapping Room database DAO interactions for CRUD operations.

classes.name: NoteRepository
classes.description: Repository class providing access to Note data via DAO, handling database operations asynchronously.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a Note by its ID using DAO.

methods.name: getByIdOnce
methods.description: Suspend function retrieving a Note by its ID once, asynchronously.

methods.name: insert
methods.description: Suspend function to insert a new Note into database.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Suspend function to update an existing Note.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Suspend function to delete a Note.
